Package hep.aida.ref.xml

Interface Summary
AidaHandler  
 

Class Summary
AidaHandlerImpl  
AidaParser The class reads XML documents according to specified DTD and translates all related events into AidaHandler events.
AidaStyleXMLReader Restore IPlotterStyle from XML
AidaStyleXMLWriter Convert AIDA objects to XML.
AidaXMLStore  
AidaXMLStoreFactory An implementation of IStoreFactory that creates Aida XML Store.
